channel.title: Comments on: Bionic Band – $0.22 of Silicone
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Evan
item.dc:creator: Evan
item.description: I saw the BionicBand at the Iowa State Fair and I am thankful I did not fall the scam. I wondered why they wanted to give us FREE band when we spent $150. Now I know- spend $150 get a $.20 band for free. What a rip off. I bet the $150 bracelet cost them $5.
item.content:encoded: I saw the BionicBand at the Iowa State Fair and I am thankful I did not fall the scam. I wondered why they wanted to give us FREE band when we spent $150. Now I know- spend $150 get a $.20 band for free. What a rip off. I bet the $150 bracelet cost them $5.

item.title: By: Terry
item.dc:creator: Terry
item.description: I am a user of the Bionic Band and i can tell you it does work. And yes I am sure the basic bands cost very little as they are ordered but it is what they do to it once they get them that makes the difference. not that they are ordering them at little cost.
item.content:encoded: I am a user of the Bionic Band and i can tell you it does work. And yes I am sure the basic bands cost very little as they are ordered but it is what they do to it once they get them that makes the difference. not that they are ordering them at little cost.
